introduction: SYNOPSISMi-kyung, kidnapped while travelling, gets sold off to an island near Busan where high class prostituting takes place. Mrs. Han turns Mi-kyung into an object of pleasure for men and takes vengeful comfort by imposing Mi-kyung the pain she was once subjected to. On the other hand, Mi-kyung's father passes time by drinking in despair having given up the search for her. After her attempt to escape, Mi-kyung is tortured and becomes ill until she regains her hope with a help of Jae-hyun.
